text:
Hi Team,
      After Feb end legacy scope (contacts) will be deprecated right? and we need to use granular scope
 let's say if the connection still using the legacy scope (contacts), will my integration stop working after Feb end?  or it will continue working ?? please help me out with this query !!!!
Actually, our app is not auto migrated to a new scope, and also it's not showing manual migrate as well. what was our next step ?? please help us

Hi there. I'm currently working on building a serverless function for returning data using a logged in contact's ID reference as a lookup (utilising private content functionality). When calling the serverless function, there's no authentication. Is there a way to authenticate the user during the execution of the serverless function/pass the contact's ID reference to the function securely? Thanks

Hi :slightly_smiling_face: This endpoint <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form> is possible send proprieties the contact. How do send proprieties the tickets? I want to send for pipeline espefic.

Hi everyone!

As far as I am aware, the Conversion API to share Facebook event date is still in Beta
(source: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/ads/share-event-and-website-data-with-facebook-with-the-conversions-api> )

Is there any estimate when this might have the stable version/launch?
